clear a bit
#define BIT_CLEAR(v, mask) (v &= ~(1 << mask))

test output: 

page offset: 00000000000000000000000011010000
tlb id: 00000000000000000000000000000100
tlb tag: 00000000000000000000000011110111
old address: 11110111000100101100000011010000
page offset: 00000000000000000000000110100011
tlb id: 00000000000000000000000000000000
tlb tag: 00000000000000000000000000000000
new address: 00000000000100101000000110100011

the new tlb tag is 0 because there is a stack overflaw
